entry.title: Secure Your Bitcoin Vault with a YubiKey: Casa
entry.summary: Casa, a leading provider of Bitcoin self-custody services, has announced an integration with YubiKeys, enabling users to secure their Bitcoin vaults with Yubikeys.¬† YubiKeys are small physical devices that provide multi-factor authentication and securely store sensitive data like passwords and keys. By integrating support for YubiKeys, Casa members can now use the devices as one of the keys in their multi-signature Bitcoin vaults. When setting up a YubiKey with Casa, users generate a Bitcoin seed phrase locally on their computer. This seed is then stored on the YubiKey itself, protected by a passkey.¬† The integration uses passkey cryptography to ensure the seed phrase never leaves the YubiKey and can only be accessed when authenticating through Casa's service. Casa emphasises this provides superior security over traditional wallet recovery seeds, which can be vulnerable to phishing and theft if written down or stored digitally. With a YubiKey, the seed is cryptographically bound to Casa's domain, preventing phishing attacks. By integrating with YubiKeys, Casa provides its members with more flexibility in securing their Bitcoin. YubiKeys offer convenience through their compact size and easy tap-to-use authentication. The company plans to open-source the core integration code in the future. The launch demonstrates growing development in Bitcoin self-custody approaches as demand grows from both retail and institutional users to make self-custody more secure, better, and easier.

entry.title: Binance Legal Triumph Ignites 6,000% Surge In BNB Trading Volume
entry.summary:
Since June, trade volume for Binance Coin (BNB) has surged almost 6,000%. Several important events inside the Binance ecosystem that have attracted the interest of both market watchers and investors will help to explain this explosive rise.
At the time of writing, BNB was trading at $579, up nearly 3% and 0.9%, respectively, in the 24-hour and weekly frames, data by Coingecko shows.
The latest ending of the SEC‚Äôs probe on Binance‚Äôs stablecoin issuer marks one of the most important factors fueling this increase. Putting an end to this investigation has provided much-needed legal clarity, solving long-standing problems that have been hanging over the Binance environment. Binance sees the SEC‚Äôs decision as a big win because it will help buyers trust them again.
SEC just silently end‚Ä¶

entry.title: FTX Japan Fully Acquired By BitFlyer, Eyes Launch Of Crypto Spot ETFs ‚Äì Details
entry.summary:
On Friday, Japan-based cryptocurrency exchange BitFlyer announced the completion of its acquisition of 100% of the outstanding shares of FTX Japan, making FTX Japan a wholly-owned subsidiary.
The acquisition, finalized on July 26, 2024, comes after FTX Trading and related entities, including the Japan subsidiary, filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the United States on November 11, 2022.¬†
Plans To Transform FTX Japan Into A Crypto Custody Giant
As announced, following approval of the sale order by the US Bankruptcy Court on July 16, BitFlyer has successfully integrated FTX Japan into its operations, with significant changes on the horizon to capitalize on the acquisition.
As part of the transition, FTX Japan will change its name by August 26, 2024, with the tentative ne‚Ä¶

entry.title: Research Firm Says Wall Street Doesn‚Äôt Understand Ethereum As Outflows Plague Spot ETFs
entry.summary:
The Spot Ethereum ETFs haven‚Äôt exactly gotten off to the perfect start, with these funds experiencing mixed flows in their first three days of trading. Crypto research firm 10x Research has provided some answers as to why institutional investors aren‚Äôt so enthusiastic about these funds.¬†
Wall Street Doesn‚Äôt Fully Understand What ETH Is About
10x Research suggested in a recent report that institutional investors haven‚Äôt warmly received the Spot Ethereum ETFs because they don‚Äôt fully understand what it is about. The report, written by Markus Thielen, noted that these Wall Street investors ‚Äúusually don‚Äôt place bets on things they don‚Äôt understand.‚Äù¬†

entry.title: bitFlyer Swallows FTX Japan Whole: Plans to Enhance Crypto Custody and ETF
entry.summary: bitFlyer Holdings Inc, a cryptocurrency exchange in Japan, has announced it has completed the acquisition of 100% of FTX Japan‚Äôs outstanding shares, making it its wholly-owned subsidiary. This subsidiary will be rebranded under the bitFlyer name by August 26, 2024. Expanding with Acquisition This acquisition aligns with bitFlyer‚Äôs strategic goals on two main fronts. First, the company aims to enhance its crypto custody services with advanced security features designed for institutional investors. Additionally, bitFlyer plans to offer services related to cryptocurrency spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in the future. entry.title: WATCH: Robert F. Kennedy, Michael Saylor to Speak at Largest Bitcoin Conference in Nashville
entry.summary: The Bitcoin 2024 conference in Nashville continues today with a packed schedule of high-profile keynotes and discussions on the future of Bitcoin. Following yesterday's industry-focused sessions, the main two-day Bitcoin 2024 conference kicks off this morning. Speakers slated for today include Michael Saylor, Cathie Wood, Edward Snowden, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and more Bitcoin luminaries. The conference opened with remarks from Tennessee's Commissioner Stuart McWhorter. MicroStrategy CEO Michael Saylor will deliver a keynote speech on Bitcoin and MicroStrategy. ARK Invest's Cathie Wood will speak on macroeconomic trends and Bitcoin's role. U.S. Senators Cynthia Lummis and Tim Scott will discuss Bitcoin's growing prominence in American politics. Other notable sessions include Edward Snowden and U.S. Presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy.¬† With over 35,000 attendees, Bitcoin 2024 is poised to be the largest Bitcoin conference ever. The event underscores Bitcoin's evolution from an obscure digital asset to an integral part of the global financial system. The speaker lineup attracts financial, political, and cultural leaders. Their presentations will explore Bitcoin's potential to transform money, business, technology, and society. They will be followed by some huge announcements.¬† Bitcoin 2024's Industry Day will be live-streamed on Bitcoin Magazine YouTube and X today, starting at 9:00 AM EST.

entry.title: Bitcoin Deposits To Binance Spike: Selling Not Over Yet?
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows the Binance exchange has received large net Bitcoin inflows during the past day, indicating that BTC‚Äôs decline may extend further.
Bitcoin Binance Netflow Has Just Taken To Positive Values
In a new post on X, CryptoQuant community manager Maartunn discussed the latest trend in the Bitcoin exchange netflow for the cryptocurrency exchange Binance.
The ‚Äúexchange netflow‚Äù here refers to an on-chain metric that measures the net amount of Bitcoin entering or exiting out of the wallets attached to any given exchange. The indicator‚Äôs value is calculated by subtracting the outflows from the inflows.
When the metric‚Äôs value is positive, the inflows overwhelm the outflows, and a net number of tokens enter the platform. As one of the main reasons investors deposit to exch‚Ä¶

entry.title: Could Bitcoin Be The US ‚ÄòTrump Card‚Äô Against China‚Äôs Economic Power? Riot Executive Answers
entry.summary:
In the ongoing global economic and geopolitical rivalry, the United States may have a powerful new weapon ‚Äì Bitcoin (BTC). That is the argument made by Sam Lyman, the director of public policy at Riot Platforms, one of the largest Bitcoin mining companies.
America‚Äôs Key To Economic Supremacy?
Writing for Forbes, Lyman drew parallels between today‚Äôs competition in the digital asset economy and the historic ‚Äúspace race‚Äù between the US and the Soviet Union during the Cold War.¬†
Just as the US prevailed in the space race by landing the first man on the moon, Lyman believes Bitcoin could become America‚Äôs ‚ÄúTrump card‚Äù in its economic rivalry with China.
The key, Lyman says, is for the US to classify Bitcoin as a strategic reserve asset ‚Äì a resource that a nation accumulates to bolster ‚Ä¶

Grayscale launches ‚ÄòDecentralised AI Fund‚Äô. Dimon may be ‚Äòchanging tune‚Äô on Bitcoin. Many alts now bounced 50-90% from lows. Vote implies 55% of Mt. Gox depositors won‚Äôt sell. BlockFi to make creditor distributions this month. WazirX exchanges sees $230m suspected breach. Vitalik warns against voting ‚Äòpro-crypto‚Äô. Vitalik & Autism Capital trade barbs. Bitcoin Magazine to hold pro-Trump fundraiser. State Street explore blockchain payments. UPbit sees 44% monthly drop in volume.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 160 - CHATTING TO ROBINHOOD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$423m. Crypto pushes higher, biggest ETF inflow in 6 weeks. Mt. Gox FUD ‚Äòoverestimated‚Äô as whales accumulate. Kraken to begin Mt. Gox repayments in 7-14d. ETH spot ETFs will push ETH to $5k: Bitwise. SOL ETF will be next: Bloomberg. XRP up 35% this week ahead of potential settlement. Aethir reports $36m H1 customer revenue. Craig Wright now under threat of perjury & forgery. FTX & CFTC in $12.7bn settlement. WLD up 40% after delaying unlock schedule. Helio announces instant crypto fiat commerce. Phantom pauses cross-chain swaps amid exploit.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 159 - MEMECOINS GO MAD!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Inflows: +$301m. BTC dips from $65k as $6bn moves from Mt. Gox. Coinbase & MicroStrategy surge with BTC. Genesis sells another $38m BTC. ETH ETF timeline delayed until July 23rd. Trump chooses crypto friendly Vance as VP. Old clip shows Vance bashing Gensler on crypto. Bitcoin is good during debasement: Larry Fink. Michael Dell calls Fink video ‚Äòfascinating‚Äô. Fear & Greed index shifts to Greed. Tether mints $1bn USDT on Tron. Stripe expands crypto integration to the EU.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 158 - A WILD WEEKEND FOR BITCOIN
entry.summary: Trump response optimism takes BTC to $63K. Bitcoin whales accumulate most since April 2023. Trump still set to talk at Bitcoin Nashville. ETH ETF approval this week: Geraci. XRP vs SEC press conference rumoured on 18th. Crypto funds saw $1.44B inflows last week. Rumours China is to ‚Äòunban BTC‚Äô in Q4. S. Korea may delay crypto taxes until 2028. Russia to allow crypto trading on stock exchange. All altcoin categories outperform BTC over 7d. BitConnect infamous promoter convicted. Scroll becomes 8th L2 with TVL over $1bn. ETHFI Season 2 claims available this week. Base hits record 1m UserOps in a week.

entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 157 - ROLLBIT FRIDAY!
entry.summary: The German state sells $2bn+ BTC and has under $300m left. BTC ETF sees $800M of inflows, Mr 100 keeps buying. SOL ETF deadline set for 2025, election could be key. SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville conference. Golman Sachs to launch 3 tokenization projects. Short squeeze in altcoins sees TIA rise 80% from lows. MOG leads top memes coins, BONK flips WIF. Farming interest shifts to Berachain & Monad.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he‚Äôs still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn‚Äôt done with the project. Instead, he‚Äôs planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 156 - ETH ON THE RISE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$147m. ETH outperforms with ETF optimism. Germany government moves 2375 BTC again. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Goldman Sachs to launch 3 tokenisation projects. Realised losses similar to COVID period. Staked ETH nears ATH. CEX stablecoin volume hits 7-month low. CFTC says 70-80% of crypto not securities. Base hardfork improves compression 20-30%. BitMEX pleads guilty to AML violation. APTOS & SEI see weak attendance at ETHcc event.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 155 - ETFs SAVE THE DAY
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: $216m. $654m of inflows into ETFs over 3 days. BTC transaction fees hit 4-year low. German state moves $300m BTC, holdings $1bn. SOL flips ETH for 7d DEX volumes. SOL Firedancer sees first accepted block on testnet. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Crypto monthly active addresses tops 100m. Biden crypto veto now expected to be upheld. Tech coalition urges Biden to back crypto. People face security threats at ETHCC. DBS sees 300% growth in crypto trading. PYUSD now 7th largest stable coin. China may have already sold BTC holdings. Elliptic exposes $11bn USDT scam network. StanChart in talks to buy Howard‚Äôs crypto fund. Polychain accuses former employee of side deals. SEI leads altcoins as it launches v2 mainnet beta. TIA rises 80% from lows on short squeeze. TON to release L2 based on Polygon‚Äôs tech stack.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 154 - THE CELEBS ARE BACK...
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$295m. ETF inflows fight German selling, BTC unchanged. German government sells $900m BTC, moves more. Rate of sales implies German supply sold this week. ETH ETFs set to launch next week. Election may affect SOL ETF decision March 2025. Raydium beats ETH for 24hr fees. BTC ‚Äòpower law‚Äô points to 300% gain by 2025. BTC in 80 day post-halving re-accumulation phase. BlackRock treasury fund hits $500m. Republicans release pro-crypto policy. Senate urges blockchain tests for national security. Drop in BTC mining difficulty ‚Äòcomparable to FTX‚Äô. MetaMask introduces delegation toolkit. 25 major projects to launch tokens in H2 2025.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 153 - A WEAK WEEKEND
entry.summary: BTC sinks 5% then bounces back to unchanged. $58-60k the main area for ‚Äòshorts to defend‚Äô. Crypto funds saw $441m inflows last week. German government transfers 1000 BTC to sell. Crypto sentiment at lowest in over a year. ETH spot premium hits local highs. Japanese firm Metaplanet buys $2.5m BTC. Expect more miners merging: TeraWulf CEO. SOL Firedancer bug bounty goes live. GLM transfers $117m of ETH treasury to exchanges. 98% of coins have topped this cycle: Kang. ETH ETF should come in next 2 weeks: Geraci. Crypto progress disheartening: Copeland.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!
entry.summary: BTC hits $54k, set for worst week in over year. Mt. Gox begins to move BTC & make distributions. German government continues to sell holdings. Worst day for BTC liquidations since FTX. Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Gensler‚Äôs emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL. Taiwan Mobile may open crypto exchange. Unisat completes funding round with Binance.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 151 - BTC TAPS THE 60K LINE
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: -$14m. BTC drops to $60k, CME gap filed again. $1bn shorts liquidated if we rally to $62.6k. Pump(.)fun surpasses ETH for revenue. ETH will outperform BTC after ETF launch: K33. ETH ETF may be delayed even further. BTC heading to $150k: Fundstrat. Chainlink & Fidelity partner for fund data on-chain. USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sentient Labs raises $85m for AI on SOL. Mantra to tokenise $500m of real estate. TAO falls 15% after security breach. Crypto scams & hacks hit $572m in Q2.
